content: **crocheted baby blanket in drops merino extra fine piece is worked with zig-zag pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-083-by yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 41-57 cm length = 60-70 cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150 g colour 01 off white 100-150 g colour 37 misty forest 100-150 g colour 47 sage green 50-100 g colour 07 light taupe 50-100 g colour 26 pistachio **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm 1 repetition of a 2 measures approx 8 cm in width note remember that crochet hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
